member.summary: Specifies a global site property.

member.name: M:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.ProjectProperty(System.String,System.String)

member.name: M:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.ProjectProperty(System.String,System.String,Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.AutoHyperlinkType,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.UrlEncodingType)
member.summary: Specifies a global site property and other options.
member.param: the name of the property to be retrieved
the default value to use if the property is not found

TRUE to insert
tags into the text stream and to replace multiple spaces with a nonbreaking space.
TRUE to re-pass the rendered content through the CAML interpreter, which allows CAML to render CAML.
TRUE to convert embedded characters so that they are displayed as text in the browser. In other words, characters that could be confused with HTML tags are converted to entities.
TRUE to remove white space from the beginning and end of the value returned by the element.
specifies how to handle URL encoding

member.name: T:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.AutoHyperlinkType
member.summary: Specifies how to handle automatic hyperlinks.

member.name: F:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.AutoHyperlinkType.None
member.summary: Hyperlinks are ignored.

member.name: F:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.AutoHyperlinkType.Plain
member.summary: Surround text with <A> tags if the text appears like a hyperlink (for example, www.johnholliday.net), but without HTML encoding.

member.name: F:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.AutoHyperlinkType.HTMLEncoded
member.summary: Surround text with <A> tags if the text appears like a hyperlink, with HTML encoding.

member.name: T:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.UrlEncodingType
member.summary: Specifies options for URL encoding.

member.name: F:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.UrlEncodingType.None
member.summary: Special characters are not encoded.

member.name: F:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.UrlEncodingType.Standard
member.summary: Convert special characters, such as spaces, to quoted UTF-8 format.

member.name: F:Dak.SPS2013.Library.CAML.UrlEncodingType.EncodeAsUrl
member.summary: Convert special characters to quoted UTF-8 format, but treats the characters as a path component of a URL so that forward slashes ("/") are not encoded.
